title: Roast pork and crackling with fruity red cabbage
ingredients: 1.5kg/3lb 4oz pork loin, skin and fat scored diagonally several times using a very sharp knife
2 Bramley apples, or similar cooking apples, peeled, cores removed, roughly chopped
1.5kg/3lb 4oz pork loin, skin and fat scored diagonally several times using a very sharp knife
2 Bramley apples, or similar cooking apples, peeled, cores removed, roughly chopped
salt and freshly ground black pepper
